title: The Valley of Decision
description: Where the Black Mountains pierce the sky, they divide the south from the north, Alamir from the kingdom of Belenus. Belenus, the undying master of the north, commanded Keiran – the Captain of the Hosts – to conquer Alamir. But the Captain is deep in conspiracy, and he has his own plans. The Valley of Decision is a fantasy novel, a saga of slavery, freedom, and choices.
author: Shannon McDermott
